DESIGN & DEVELOPMENT PROJECTS
Global Experience in Rapidly Evolving Industries
RECENT WORK
RSVMe
Aligning UX/UI Strategy with Business Goals
The RSVMe app provides beauty, massage, and wellness services for those who want to search less and save more. Powered by unique mobile sales platform technology, RSVMe instantly matches customers with available providers nearby. Cloud Interactive helped RSVMe overcome initial growth obstacles with a thorough UX/UI redesign.
See How
Poshmark
Building The Largest Online Social Marketplace for Fashion
Poshmark isn't just the No.1 place to buy and sell apparel online, but a vibrant community of users who are passionate about fashion. With visual branding and marketing material by Cloud Interactive, Poshmark has gathered millions of people across America to buy and sell apparel, shoes and accessories, both new and used.
See How
XareFit
The Next Generation of Digitally Integrated Fitness Clubs
XareFit is pushing new boundaries in the fitness industry. Working with Cloud Interactive, XareFit has developed a revolutionary, one-stop fitness platform by integrating its Member Experience, equipment management, and fitness tracking into a single platform.
See How
Advantech
Intelligent Retail: Digital Transformation for the Retail Industry
UShop+ provides big data business intelligence and sales insight to small and large retailers alike. UShop+ is powered by an interface designed and developed by Cloud Interactive.
See How
DLCS
Revolutionizing the Dermatology Industry
Cloud Interactive helped DLCS create a state of art digital tracking and reading solution, allowing the laboratory to provide the best and fastest customer support in the industry.
See How
Renesas
Custom Design Solution for SMEs
Renesas streamlined business activities, increased revenue, and cut costs with an Enterprise solution from Cloud Interactive.

Cisco

Cloud Interactive redesigned Cisco’s Security Platform using human-centered UI/UX to deliver streamlined customer experience. Happy customers (and customer support) ensued.
